Posts.Content: LanieM414 wrote: I received a Fitbit Charge HR for my birthday. I'm excited to use it when I start my walks next week. BUT, i wear watches on my left arm, the same side my breast cancer is on. They don't take bp from that arm are so is wearing a Fitbit safe? I plan on asking my nurse tomorrow at chemo but thought I'd ask you lovely ladies as well! Thanks in advance!! Lanie ~ Life Doesn't Stop With Stage IV BC! I WILL Be Stronger!!!
